title: The Tiger and Phil Era Is Over
headline: The End of the Tiger Woods-Phil Mickelson Era
description: For the first time since 1992, both Tiger Woods and Phil Mickelson failed to win a Tour event this season. Take a look back at their 22-year run with these memorable photos from our Sports Illustrated archives.
short_headline: The End of the Tiger Woods-Phil Mickelson Era
page_title: The Tiger and Phil Era Is Over
slug: The End of the Tiger Woods-Phil Mickelson Era
body: For the first time since 1992, both Tiger Woods and Phil Mickelson failed to win a Tour event this season. Take a look back at their 22-year run with these memorable photos from our Sports Illustrated archives.
